method.name: get_hand_capsule_count
method.description: Gets the total number of hand capsules.

method.name: get_hand_capsule_height
method.description: Gets the height of the given capsule for the given hand ([code]0[/code] is left, and [code]1[/code] is right).

method.name: get_hand_capsule_joint
method.description: Gets the joint that drives the transform of the given capsule for the given hand ([code]0[/code] is left, and [code]1[/code] is right).

method.name: get_hand_capsule_radius
method.description: Gets the radius of the given capsule for the given hand ([code]0[/code] is left, and [code]1[/code] is right).

method.name: get_hand_capsule_transform
method.description: Gets the transform of the given capsule for the given hand ([code]0[/code] is left, and [code]1[/code] is right).

method.name: is_enabled
method.description: Checks if the extension is enabled or not.
